organic.title: National Camps for Blind Children - Christian Record Services
organic.snippet: NCBC is a program for United States citizens, and partner camps welcome applicants ages 9-65 (ages may vary by location) whose corrected vision is not better ...

organic.title: NFB Camp | National Federation of the Blind
organic.snippet: NFB Camp offers childcare for ages 6 weeks to 12 (blind/sighted) with lessons, activities, and vetted staff. Camp runs July 3-8, 2024. Enrollment deadline is June 15. $150/week for one child.

organic.title: "Christian Record Services, Inc. - Empowering the Blind and Visually ...
organic.snippet: "Christian Record Services, Inc. provides resources and support for people who are blind or visually impaired. Discover our programs, services, ...

organic.title: NFB BELL® Academy | National Federation of the Blind
organic.snippet: NFB BELL Academy is a summer program for blind children (ages 4-12) offering Braille and nonvisual skills instruction. In-person programs are available. Registration is open.

organic.title: Vision Impairment Camps - Very Special Camps
organic.snippet: An overnight outdoor adventure camp for kids who are blind or have a significant visual impairment, and who are ready to stretch their legs and hit the trail.
